MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-MAR-2021 00:13.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30pm due to a fault with our electrical equipment on Spittal Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10:06 PM on Friday, 26 March 2021.
